tool_description: This API returns latest Tea News around the world.
name: Tea News
title: Tea News

api_list.name: Get Individual Tea News
api_list.description: Get News about Tea from specific news resources.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tea-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/EconomicTimes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tea-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tea-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tea-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Tea News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about tea from all over the world.
